ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The capital of Hubei province in east central China and a major commercial and industrial city. It is located at the junction of the Han and Yangtze Rivers, and comprises the former cities of Hankou, Hanyang, and Wuchang.: The act of going from one place to another.

PermissibleValues.value: Exposure to a cluster of patients with severe acute lower respiratory distress of unknown etiology
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Cluster People With Unknown Etiology Severe Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome Exposure

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Cluster People With Unknown Etiology Severe Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome Exposure
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A grouping of a number of similar things.: Human beings in general.: Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.: The cause of a disease or abnormal condition.: A form of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) that is marked by severe hypoxemia. Based on the Berlin criteria, onset must occur within one week of a clinical insult or there must be evidence of new or worsening respiratory symptoms. Chest imaging reveals bilateral opacities consistent with pulmonary edema that are not fully explained by effusions, lobar/lung collapse, or nodules. Respiratory failure is not fully explained by heart failure or fluid overload and objective assessment, e.g. echocardiography, is required to exclude hydrostatic edema if no risk factor is present. Additionally, oxygenation as measured by a partial pressure of arterial oxygen (PaO2) to the fraction of inspired oxygen (FIO2) is equivalent to 100 mm Hg or less with positive end-expiratory pressure (PEEP) of at least 5 cm of water (Ranieri VM et al., JAMA. 2012;307(23):2526-2533). Severe ARDS may be associated with cytokine release syndrome.: The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of a number of similar things.
Human beings in general.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
The cause of a disease or abnormal condition.

A form of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) that is marked by severe hypoxemia. Based on the Berlin criteria, onset must occur within one week of a clinical insult or there must be evidence of new or worsening respiratory symptoms. Chest imaging reveals bilateral opacities consistent with pulmonary edema that are not fully explained by effusions, lobar/lung collapse, or nodules. Respiratory failure is not fully explained by heart failure or fluid overload and objective assessment, e.g. echocardiography, is required to exclude hydrostatic edema if no risk factor is present. Additionally, oxygenation as measured by a partial pressure of arterial oxygen (PaO2) to the fraction of inspired oxygen (FIO2) is equivalent to 100 mm Hg or less with positive end-expiratory pressure (PEEP) of at least 5 cm of water (Ranieri VM et al., JAMA. 2012;307(23):2526-2533). Severe ARDS may be associated with cytokine release syndrome.
The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

Concepts.definition: A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.
Having been established or verified.
A finding indicating that an individual has been exposed to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Interactions between patients and providers within the context of healthcare delivery.
